entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
